item.title: On Binance, WLFI contract 4-hour funding rate has dropped to -0.137%.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the funding rate of the WLFI contract on some CEXs is currently presenting an abnormal negative value, suggesting that a significant number of traders are taking short positions on WLFI. Binance is currently at -0.137% (for 4 hours), and Bybit is at -0.4338% (for 4 hours).

item.title: WLFI Foundation once again spent 1 million USD to buy 3,239,000 WLFI tokens.
item.description: On September 1st, according to Arkham data, the official address of World Liberty Financial spent an additional $1 million USD just 20 minutes ago by purchasing 3.239 million WLFI. And in the past hour, it has cumulatively spent $2 million USD to purchase 6.498 million WLFI.

item.title: Binance Launches Exclusive HOLO TGE and Booster Event
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, Binance is set to launch the exclusive TGE event for Holoworld (HOLO) on September 2nd, 2025 at 16:00 UTC. Users will be able to participate in the token sale event to gain early access to the token. The sale will operate on a first-come, first-served basis, and each user can deposit up to 3 BNB.Binance will also initiate the Holoworld Booster event starting from September 2nd, 2025. Users who hold at least 61 Alpha points can participate and share a reward pool of 51,200,000 HOLO tokens.

item.title: LookOnChain: Coinbase to List WLFI
item.description: On September 1st, as per official channels, Coinbase is set to introduce support for World Liberty Financial (WLFI) on the Ethereum network (ERC-20 tokens). Trading is scheduled to commence later today, provided that liquidity requirements are fulfilled. Once an adequate supply of the asset becomes available, WLFI-USD trading pairs will be rolled out in a phased manner.

item.title: DWF Labs will list WLFI on DWF Liquid Markets
item.description: On September 1st, DWF Labs will make WLFI available for listing on DWF Liquid Markets, enabling all its institutional clients to utilize it.

item.title: Trump's Son Congratulates WLFI on Its Launch
item.description: On September 1st, Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, posted on social media that the WLFI token has officially begun (using the phrase "We are now in operation"). The WLFI team has always had faith in the power and leadership of the United States. With the official token launch today, World Liberty Financial is establishing a new benchmark for financial freedom.

item.title: WLFI opened on Binance at $0.478, and is now trading at $0.3.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, WLFI opened at 0.478 US dollars on Binance and is currently trading at 0.3 US dollars.

item.title: Ethereum Network Gas Price Drops to 63.8 Gwei
item.description: On September 1st, based on Etherscan data, the Gas Fee of the WLFI token on the Ethereum network has now decreased to 63.8 Gwei 50 minutes after its launch.

item.title: Three presale participation addresses received 160 million WLFI each, all of which were subsequently deposited into Binance.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by LookOnChain, three presale participant addresses collectively received 160 million WLFI tokens and deposited them all into Binance. The details are as follows:· The address 0xC3e7 received 60 million WLFI tokens (approximately $19.2 million).· The address 0x7ed4 received 53.33 million WLFI tokens (approximately $17.1 million).· The address 0x3881 received 46.67 million WLFI tokens (approximately $14.9 million).

item.title: Data: 30 minutes before WLFI TGE, 4 out of the Top 10 holders transferred a total of 1.86 billion WLFI to a CEX.
item.description: September 1st. On-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa) stated on social media that half an hour after the WLFI token generation event (TGE), four holders (TOP6/7/8/10) made a choice to sell some or all of their holdings partially. Meanwhile, the remaining six holders are still holding.It is reported that the holders who chose to sell all recharged their tokens into a trading platform instead of conducting on-chain transactions. These four holders have recharged a total of 1.86 billion WLFI, which accounts for 4% of the total holdings of the TOP 10 individual holders.
